EmailTemplate.description: Sent by the CSCancellationService after an account is terminated
EmailTemplate.name: CS Termination Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Account Closed Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
This message is to confirm that your BlueWave Community Solar account is closed. Effective immediately you will no longer receive bills or additional communications regarding this account from BlueWave.
If you have any questions about the cancellation process please call 844-786-4100 or email customercare@bluewavesolar.com to speak with a member of our Customer Care Team.
We're sad to see you go,
- BlueWave Customer Care
BlueWave Customer Care 844.786.4100 | customercare@bluewavesolar.com
